about_the_game:
Based on the reimagination of the classics during the prime of the renaissance, the Lion set offers a unique heroic aesthetic.
Filling every slot with a full range of customization, this exclusive armor showcases a prominent lion and the death of Medusa from Greek mythology.
The Trident is also included as a skin for the partisan weapon archetype.

Includes:


  • Lion Burgonet with a separate version with the visor removed
  • Lion Necklace
  • Lion Musculata
  • Lion Pauldrons
  • Lion Arms
  • Lion Gauntlets
  • Lion Skirt
  • Lion Greaves
  • Lion Toes
  • Trident
